description:
Chopper can no longer contain his fury over Dr. Hogback`s evil treatment of his zombie slaves. Meanwhile, Luffy prepares to face the zombie who`s wearing his shadow!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chopper Gekido!! Hogback Ma no Ijutsu
Chopper Is Furious!! Hogback`s Evil Medical Practices!
Chopper en colère ! La médecine diabolique du docteur Hogback !
Чоппер в ярости!! Бесчеловечные эксперименты Хогбака
チョッパー激怒!! ホグバック魔の医術
